modName: Categorized Favorites Menu PL - Polish version
summary: Polish language addition with custom config for \'Categorized Favorites Menu\', by pinoangel.
descriptionHtml:
Polish language addition with custom config for Categorized Favorites Menu by favmenumodder. All credits goes to him. My work, altough not easy because of polish font, was only translation and custom config.

--------------------

Currently written with version 1.7

Currently shipped with 4 and 5 columns versions. 
(quite much fixing and cosmetic changes in 5 columns relase)
Check out the picture for full experience with use of additional list for 5 columns version.

Optimized for 1440x900 resolution, 
but should work fine on all resolutions that are at least 1024x768 

--------------------

These are my own settings created during gameplay, so some things may be missing. Also, config was easy to set after decoding polish characters, but still was hard to maintain stable. Feel free to adjust, fix and upgrade it for Your own needs.
It combines with most english names too.

--------------------

It requires original mod:
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4862]Categorized Favorites Menu by favmenumodder[/url]

To install overwrite original file with favoritesmenu.cfg from my archive 
or install with mod manager.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This mod:
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5725]Categorized Favorites Menu PL - Polish version by pinoangel[/url]
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

ps:   Po polsku info nie bêdzie. Po polsku kaådy umie ;-)
